Guys we getting same error no option than using the Temp fix for making jeppview work with 1016. 
Windows XP:
Double-click the time on taskbar.
Click the Time Zones tab in the Date and Time Properties.
Select a time zone that enables the \'Automatically adjust clock for daylight saving changes\' option at the bottom.
\"It worked for me\"

Windows Vista/7
Click on the time on the taskbar.
Select \'Change date and time settings...\'
Select \'Change time zone...\'
Select a time zone that enables the \'Automatically adjust clock for Daylight Saving Time\' option.
Select OK, then OK again

POSSIBLE FIX FOR JEPPVIEW OR FLITESTAR

--------------------------------------------------------
I think I might have the answer to solve the error problem.

Just follow these steps:

1. Change the date of your computer for the 31-12-2008

2. Install the patch for the Jeppview Cycle 10-16

3. Then download and install the patch from this link: 
http://www.jeppesen.com/documents/  support/aviation/patches/StyleSheetsUpdate.exe

4. After that start Jeppview or Flitestar

5. Finally you can change the date of your computer to the correct date.

--------------------------------------------------------

Enjoy!

(Works on Windows 7 64 bits)

Post comments if it works or not!

POSSIBLE FIX FOR JEPPVIEW OR FLITESTAR

-------------------------------------------------------

I might have the solution to fix the error when opening Jeppview or Flitestar.

Follow these steps :

1. Change the of your computer for the
    31-12-2008

2. Install the update for Jeppview Cycle 10-16

3. Download and install the patch from this link :

http://www.jeppesen.com/documents/support/aviation/patches/StyleSheetsUpdate.exe

4. Then run Jeppview or Flitestar

5. Finally just change the date to the correct one.

Enjoy!

(Works on Windows 7 64 bits)

Post comments if it works or not!

W7 64 bit here and no problems installing it.
I dunno how you guys install but here how I do it:

* I never use update option within JV.
* mount image to your virtual drive and let it autorun.
* enter the coverage codes and click next.
* do the same for disk 2

That's all. It never failed.

For Capt_Minus and everyone else who have the TEXT TAB issue.

The reason why the TEXT TAB is missing after installing the Jeppview Cycle 16-10 is because of the StyleSheetUpdate.

You have to uninstall it or maybe you gonna have to reinstall everything.

Sorry for the inconvenience.

@Envelope thx for your help. but has anyone regained text tab after reinstalling and updating stylesheet. I have installed stylesheet but havent reinstalled jeppview...has anyone tried envelope trick and got text tab back in win xp?

To Capt_Minus

I had the the same problem as you with the TEXT TAB not loading when starting Jeppview or Flitestar.

I had to re-install everything without of course installing the StyleSheetUpdate, and now it works fine for me.

So I suggest that you try to do a complete uninstall of Jeppview and Flitestar (I used Revo Uninstaller Pro (TORRENT LINK BELOW)) and then re-install them without the StyleSheetUpdate.

Send me feedback please!

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5648725/

To, Enveloppe
I tried uninstalling and reinstalling jeppview and NOT installing stylesheet update..with 1016.
again i could only Open jeppview by chnaging system date to Day light Saving.
and to my surprise i got my TEXT tab back....
thanks a Lot...
regards
Capt. Minus
